content.question: In comparison to a firm in a perfectly competitive labor market, a firm in a monopsonistic labor market typically will hire

choices.label: fewer workers and pay a lower wage
fewer workers and pay the same wage
the same number of workers and pay a lower wage
more workers and pay a lower wage
more workers and pay the same wage

content.answer: fewer workers and pay a lower wage

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
